data.lyric:
[ti:Beers And Sunshine]
[ar:Darius Rucker]
[al:Beers And Sunshine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beers And Sunshine - Darius Rucker (达柳斯.拉克)
[00:03.97]Lyrics by：Ross Copperman/Darius Rucker/JT Harding/Josh Osborne
[00:07.94]Composed by：Ross Copperman/Darius Rucker/JT Harding/Josh Osborne
[00:11.91]Well I ain't gonna work today
[00:14.87]Just wanna sit around and play
[00:17.91]Gonna hit balls off the dock
[00:20.81]Kick back in my flip-flops
[00:23.69]Don't owe nothin' to the lender
[00:26.68]Nothin' spinnin' in the blender
[00:29.71]The only thing on my agenda is
[00:32.36]Beers and sunshine
[00:34.81]Bonfires and summertime
[00:37.33]Back porch nights in South Carolina
[00:40.36]Ain't nothin' finer than me and my girl strikin' up a little lighter
[00:44.56]'Cause everybody's down in a world gone crazy
[00:47.66]Don't know how to fix it but I think maybe
[00:50.50]Turn on the good times turn off the TV
[00:53.39]Yeah the only B.S. I need is beers and sunshine
[01:08.10]I'm gonna call my girl and say
[01:11.14]Let's get our friends and hit the lake
[01:14.14]Grab a boat and get to floatin'
[01:16.98]A little buzzed and a little toasted
[01:19.96]We're gonna hang and have a little fun now
[01:23.09]Flying high like we'll never come down
[01:25.86]We're gonna roll until we run out of
[01:28.75]Beers and sunshine
[01:31.21]Bonfires and summertime
[01:33.59]Back porch nights in South Carolina
[01:36.61]Ain't nothin' finer than me and my girl strikin' up a little lighter
[01:40.86]'Cause everybody's down in a world gone crazy
[01:44.03]Don't know how to fix it but I think maybe
[01:46.78]Turn on the good times turn off the TV
[01:49.73]Yeah the only B.S. I need is beers and sunshine
[01:55.79]Oh beers and sunshine oh
[02:04.40]Beers and sunshine
[02:06.77]Bonfires and summertime
[02:09.13]Back porch nights in South Carolina
[02:12.23]Ain't nothin' finer than me and my girl strikin' up a little lighter
[02:16.41]'Cause everybody's down in a world gone crazy
[02:19.58]Don't know how to fix it but I think maybe
[02:22.32]Turn on the good times turn off the TV
[02:25.23]Yeah the only B.S. I need is beers and sunshine
[02:31.10]Oh beers and sunshine
[02:39.89]Beers and sunshine
[02:42.37]Bonfires and summertime time time
[02:48.27]Oh oh oh yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Beers And Sunshine]
[ar:Darius Rucker]
[al:Beers And Sunshine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.97]//
[00:07.94]//
[00:11.91]今天我可不打算埋头工作
[00:14.87]只想好好犒劳自己放轻松
[00:17.91]尽情打球洒汗水
[00:20.81]穿着人字拖漫步
[00:23.69]无债一身轻
[00:26.68]烦闷放一边
[00:29.71]心头只牵挂
[00:32.36]可口啤酒与绝美阳光
[00:34.81]熊熊篝火与夏日时光
[00:37.33]在南卡罗来纳州的回廊之夜
[00:40.36]比不上我和宝贝的浪漫之夜
[00:44.56]世人疯癫不已
[00:47.66]无从扭转 但我想我可以
[00:50.50]关掉电视 开启美好时光
[00:53.39]我只要可口啤酒与绝美阳光
[01:08.10]致电我的爱人
[01:11.14]与三五知己 齐聚湖边
[01:14.14]齐坐船上 于湖心荡漾  
[01:16.98]酒后微醺 沉醉于美景
[01:19.96]共同欢度美好时光
[01:23.09]此情此景永不褪色
[01:25.86]一直狂欢直到
[01:28.75]可口啤酒不剩 绝美阳光不再
[01:31.21]熊熊篝火与夏日时光
[01:33.59]在南卡罗来纳州的回廊之夜
[01:36.61]比不上我和宝贝的浪漫之夜
[01:40.86]世人疯癫不已
[01:44.03]无从扭转 但我想我可以
[01:46.78]关掉电视 开启美好时光
[01:49.73]我只要可口啤酒与绝美阳光
[01:55.79]可口啤酒与绝美阳光
[02:04.40]可口啤酒与绝美阳光
[02:06.77]熊熊篝火与夏日时光

[02:12.23]比不上我和宝贝的浪漫之夜
[02:16.41]世人疯癫不已
[02:19.58]无从扭转 但我想我可以
[02:22.32]关掉电视 开启美好时光
[02:25.23]我只要可口啤酒与绝美阳光
